name: GetPageOfProjects
description: Use this endpoint to load a page of Projects.

Filter.description: Use this parameter to set the filtering for fields. [filtering instructions](#section/Retrieving-data/Filtering)

Sort.description: Use this parameter to set the sort fields and direction. [sort instructions](#section/Retrieving-data/Sorting)

PageSize.description: Use this parameter to set the page size. [pagination instructions](#section/Retrieving-data/Pagination)

SkipPages.description: Use this parameter to set number of pages to skip. [pagination instructions](#section/Retrieving-data/Pagination)

$ul:
**closedDate**: The date when the project was closed and booked.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**contactPersonId**: The number of the contact person. Has to be from the same customer as the one defined in the project.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**costPrice**: Sum of registrations based on cost price for the project

Read-only: true

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**customerNumber**: Number of customer this project is for. Required if project type is not Internal.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**deliveryDate**: The project delivery date.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**deliveryLocationNumber**: The location number used to deliver the project.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**departmentNumber**: Only relevant if the user uses addon dimensions

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**description**: Text describing the project.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**fixedPrice**: If a fixed price is agreed upon with a customer, this can be utilized. It is not retrieved when invoicing, however, so it is only used for reporting.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**invoicedTotal**: Sum of invoiced amount for the project

Read-only: true

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**isBarred**: Barred projects cannot retrieve registrations

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**isClosed**: Shows if the project is closed. Closed project can't accept more entries.

Read-only: true

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**isMainProject**: Decides whether the project is a main-project or sub-project. If false, it is a sub-project. If true, it is a main-project. Main-projects are grouping of projects. Main-project can't have entries, only sub-projects can.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**isMileageInvoiced**: Determines whether mileage should be included on sales invoices of the project

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**lastUpdated**: The date and time when this project was last updated. Use it in the filter to retrieve only updated projects.

Read-only: true

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**mainProjectNumber**: The number of the main project, if this is a sub project linked to a main project. It can be null for both main and sub projects (sub project can exist not linked to any main project, like standalone project).

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**mileage**: Default amount of mileage for the project

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**name**: Name of the project.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin, like

Sortable: false

**number**: The unique number of the project. If it's not provided in the POST requests, it's auto-generated.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: true

**objectVersion**: The object version, required for PUT requests.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**otherResponsibleEmployeeNumber**: Second employee number that is responsible for the project.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**projectGroupNumber**: The number of the project group that this project belongs.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**responsibleEmployeeNumber**: The employee number that is responsible for the project.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**salesPrice**: Sum of registrations based on sales price for the project

Read-only: true

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**status**: The number of the project status. Project status is a separate manageable resource.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**developerHint**: Some hints for the developer that might help avoid the error.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**errorCode**: The error code.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**logId**: The unique log identifier of the error.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**logTimeUtc**: The UTC time of the error being logged.

Read-only: true

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**message**: Short description about the error.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**property**: The property name in case of validation logic issue.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false
